item.title: How to hugo
item.description:
prerequis : - github desktop - hugo config.toml => need to be modify to change the copyright date lancer cmd Go to the folder blog : C:\Users
oyel\Documents\Site log> taper : hugo new post/my-first-post.md try the web site with : hugo server -D entrer http://localhost:1313/ generate the web site with : hugo -t “academic” Move the content of the folder C:\Users
oyel\Documents\Site log\public in GitHub
etmemo.github.io lancer github desktop, commit/push to master To have a file attached for the post, create a directory with the exact same name as the post md file.

item.title: OSPF vs BGP with anycast prefix
item.description: Issue R3 route traffic to R4 instead of R1. Route 10.10.10.10 toward the WAN is prefered instead of the OSPF LAN DC route. DC Client that try to reach the DC’s 10.10.10.10 address are routed toward the WAN Why R3 is installing in it RIB and redistributing the wrong routes 10.10.10.10 because it does have a better AD 20. Workarround If we filter the redistribution that doesn’t help because when the packet arrive to R3 he will still prefer the BGP route.
